summary: One of my first personal mods.I chose to upload this one just in case someone needs something like this ;)
descriptionHtml:
Description:
Recently I watched \'\'The Hobbit\'\' and was inspired to add Thorin as a DEAD free loot NPC.I noticed that some people don\'t like to raise smithing up to 100 in order to make dragonbone weapons, so i\'ve also included a Dragonbone Greatsword and Dragonbone Sword, as well as a set of ebony armor exluding the helmet just for immersion. His Corpse is located south of Riverwood in a hollow tree stump. It obviously requires Dawnguard if anyone wants the swords ;) This is my first upload and i know that anyone can do something as simple as this with the Creation Kit... so i hope that i have helped some gamers in a way. I am open for suggestions and i would gladdly read your comments. Also you can do anything you want with the file. Enjoy !!!

News:
Version 2.0 update changes:
npc\'s facial appearance has been edited as i thought that it would be better to enhance his appearance in order to make him look more like Thorin from the movie.
Also a sword has been added to represent the blade that he wielded in the early parts of his adventure.
A note was added to show how he ended up in Skyrim (people familiar with elder scrolls lore should recognise why would something like this be able to happen)-thanks to MurderWrath for the idea :)
And the book was added featuring the lyrics of the song \'\'The Misty Mountains\' Cold\'\' that the dwarves sang during a part of the movie.


Questions that COULD be asked:
- Why would you make a mod like this ?
- It is clear that i wanted to make an npc (well dead npc) representing a hero from the movie make an appearance in Skyrim

- Why isn\'t the character or the stuff appearing in the game ?
- Make sure  you are in the right place (it\'s not really hard to find) and there may be a possibility that you don\'t have your game patched into version 1.8 (currently latest) although i\'m   not sure if it conflicts with previous versions as i haven\'t tested it

- Why would you add high level items as loot into a very early location of the game?
- The current location made me feel like it matches correctly and after all, if you consider this mod cheating, then simply don\'t take the loot or even download 

Bugs/Glitches:
None Known but should anyone find any please write about the problem in the comment section- i\'m always happy to read your comments and help in any way i can
author: Kotaidakos
